## Fixes / Closes

Required when applicable: add one line per issue.

- Fixes #<issue-number>
- Resolves #<issue-number>
- Closes #<issue-number>

Notes:
- Put the closing keyword here (not only in commit messages). This is the most reliable way to ensure issues close automatically when the PR is merged.
- If this PR doesn't address a tracked issue, write: `N/A`.

## Testing
- [ ] Not run (explain why)
- [ ] Unit/contract tests: `uv run pytest tests/unit tests/contract`
- [ ] Integration tests (if relevant): see `docs/ci-configuration.md`
